tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_information (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    encrypted_address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  order_date DATE,
  total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    customer_email VARCHAR(50),
    customer_phone VARCHAR(15),
    encrypted_data BYTES
);

CREATE TABLE addresses (
    address_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    address_line1 VARCHAR(100),
    address_line2 VARCHAR(100),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    customer_email VARCHAR(50),
    customer_phone VARCHAR(15),
    customer_address VARCHAR(100),
    encrypted_data VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    order_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    encrypted_data VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE payments (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT,
    payment_date DATE,
    payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    encrypted_data VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE addresses (
    address_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    street_address VARCHAR(100),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(50),
    postal_code VARCHAR(10),
    encrypted_data VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE address_information (
    address_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customer_information(customer_id),
    street_address VARCHAR(100),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    postal_code VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE communication_history (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customer_information(customer_id),
    communication_date TIMESTAMP,
    communication_method VARCHAR(20),
    communication_content TEXT
);
